meanings.sent1: The yeasted bread rose beautifully in the oven.
meanings.sent2: I love the smell of freshly yeasted dough.
meanings.sent3: The yeasted cake was so fluffy, it almost floated away!
meanings.sent4: Her yeasted buns were like little clouds on a plate.
meanings.sent5: The yeasted pizza crust was light as air.

meanings.sent1: The yeasted rolls were a hit at the dinner party.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a warm slice of yeasted bread with butter.
meanings.sent3: The yeasted muffins were so good, they disappeared in minutes.
meanings.sent4: The yeasted pastry was a golden delight.
meanings.sent5: The yeasted pretzels were twisted perfection.

meanings.sent1: The yeasted doughnuts were a sweet treat.
meanings.sent2: He savored the taste of the yeasted beer.
meanings.sent3: The yeasted pancakes were a fluffy surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her yeasted waffles were a breakfast delight.
meanings.sent5: The yeasted bagels were chewy and delicious.
